DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effect of the paravertebral block using a multi-lumen catheter on the incidence and severity of acute and chronic postthoracotomy pain compared to the thoracic epidural block.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Paravertebral Block Using a Multi-orifice Catheter on Preventing Acute and Chronic Post-thoracotomy Pain
DOC.criteria: patients receiving surgery through a thoracotomy incision patients with cardiovascular disease patients with neurologic disease patients with contraindications to paravertebral block or epidural block patients with history of previous thoracotomy incision patients with pain at the expected incision site
